title: Rick Valicenti
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717075012/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717075012/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Rick Valicenti**

Born in Pittsburgh PA 1951/10/20. Degrees in photography and painting. Founder of the Chicago-based graphic design firm Thirst (1981) and the digital type foundry [Thirstype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140717075012/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Thirstype) (1994). Designer of the typefaces Bronzo (aka UltraBronzo) and Ooga Booga, and co-designer of Commerce (with Greg Thompson), and Infinity, Apex Sans, and Apex Serif (with Chester).
